title: It takes 10x more skill to play AGAINST Fiora than it takes to play AS Fiora
body:
**Skill requirement of playing _as_ Fiora:**

* Point to the side with a vital, press Q.
* If you see shit coming, press W.
* Right click the dude.

**Skill requirement of playing _against_ Fiora:**

* Position perfectly so you can farm while keeping the vital side away.
* Keep up a near-instant reaction time to move the vital away when she dashes.
* Know when to simply stand back and give up farm when the vital side is facing her.
* Know when to hold your CC and wait for her W.
* Be able to bait out her W.
* Be able to turn on her and cast CC before she can W.
* Know when she is going to W to slow and dodge it.
* Be able to kite and lead the fight out of her activated R.
* Watch her Q cooldown so you can cast your skillshots.

#And that's on top of the skill it takes to play your own champ.

How is this fair?

I would love that Fiora could just riposte one ability, but I think she got the Award of #LC$BIGPLAY$ and is in the Hall of Fame with {{champion:64}} and {{champion:412}} 

Her E is fine. Its just something she took from Darius same for her Riposte. Her E before was pretty strong. THats what actually made her the Grand Duelist. Burst of attack speed. Now we have auto attack reset with a stronger 2nd hit, which is basically a free crit at lv 5. A good trade off compared to the other abilities.

Ult is pretty ridiculous. Can only be countered through {{item:3053}} and {{item:3140}}. Old Ult, you gotta take the damage. Trade off is that she gets a butt load amount of heal before and deals a lot of AoE damage, Now she gives AoE Heal. AoE heal is far worse than AoE damage because you can exhaust that damage. You cant exhaust true damage and you have {{champion:40}}'s ult on crack

On paper, anyone would say that Riot overtuned her. Does she need more nerfs? I don't think so right now. We will just have to wait, but she is my top ban for bs.

I might've missed some "vital" information, but this is what I see right now compared to old fiora and the current one.
